name: Amber's Magic Shop
summary: Amber, a dark elf, was abandoned as baby in the woods south of Icesilia. She was found and raised by Vin, a witch, who decided she should become an alchemist. When Amber turned sixteen, Vin sent her to Icesilia as apprentice to the legendary mage Haros.
info:
• 平台: pc
  • 发行日期: 2017年6月9日
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/584940/Ambers_Magic_Shop/
  • 开发: Winter Wolves
  • 发行: Winter Wolves
